paragraphs: Kristen Marrow is a professional reiner with over 20 years of experience. She has won numerous titles and awards, including the NRHA Futurity and Derby. Kristen is known for her exceptional horsemanship and training techniques, and she is dedicated to helping riders of all levels improve their skills and achieve their goals.

Kristen offers a variety of services, including training, lessons, and clinics. She works with riders of all ages and experience levels, from beginners to advanced competitors. Kristen is passionate about helping her students develop a strong foundation of horsemanship and achieve success in the show pen.

Whether you are just starting out in reining or looking to take your riding to the next level, Kristen Marrow can help you reach your full potential. Contact her today to learn more about her services and schedule a lesson or clinic.
